texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: SOFTWARE MAINTENANCE AGREEMENT
texts.text: SOFTWARE MAINTENANCE AGREEMENT

texts.label: text
texts.orig: This Software Maintenance Agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into as of October 13, 2016, between Leader Act Ltd HK ("LEADER"), a Nevada Corporation, (hereinafter referred to as "Leader"), and EZJR, Inc. a Nevada corporation, (hereinafter referred to as "EZJR").
texts.text: This Software Maintenance Agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into as of October 13, 2016, between Leader Act Ltd HK ("LEADER"), a Nevada Corporation, (hereinafter referred to as "Leader"), and EZJR, Inc. a Nevada corporation, (hereinafter referred to as "EZJR").

texts.label: text
texts.orig: WHEREAS, EZJR currently owns a Customer Relationship Management ("CRM") software program as developed by LEADER; and
texts.text: WHEREAS, EZJR currently owns a Customer Relationship Management ("CRM") software program as developed by LEADER; and

texts.label: text
texts.orig: WHEREAS, upon the purchase of the software EZJR entered into an agreement for LEADER to maintain the software for a period of two years after which LEADER was be paid by EZJR to service and maintain the software; and
texts.text: WHEREAS, upon the purchase of the software EZJR entered into an agreement for LEADER to maintain the software for a period of two years after which LEADER was be paid by EZJR to service and maintain the software; and

texts.label: text
texts.orig: WHEREAS, this previous agreement expired on May 28, 2016;
texts.text: WHEREAS, this previous agreement expired on May 28, 2016;

texts.label: text
texts.orig: NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual agreements, representations and warranties in this Agreement, the parties agree as follows:
texts.text: NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual agreements, representations and warranties in this Agreement, the parties agree as follows:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1. EXTENSION OF SERVICE AGREEMENT. Subject to all other terms and conditions set forth herein, as of the date of this agreement, LEADER maintain the software for an additional five years.
texts.text: 1. EXTENSION OF SERVICE AGREEMENT. Subject to all other terms and conditions set forth herein, as of the date of this agreement, LEADER maintain the software for an additional five years.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2. COMPENSATION TO LEADER. The compensation to LEADER shall be: 3,000,000 shares of EZJR's unregistered restricted common stock which shall be issuable upon the closing;
texts.text: 2. COMPENSATION TO LEADER. The compensation to LEADER shall be: 3,000,000 shares of EZJR's unregistered restricted common stock which shall be issuable upon the closing;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. LEADER' REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES. LEADER represents and warrants to EZJR as follows:
texts.text: 3. LEADER' REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES. LEADER represents and warrants to EZJR as follows:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: A. LEADER is a corporation duly organized, validly existing, and in good standing under the laws of the Nevada. Leader has all requisite corporate power and authority to enter into this Agreement and perform its obligations hereunder.
texts.text: A. LEADER is a corporation duly organized, validly existing, and in good standing under the laws of the Nevada. Leader has all requisite corporate power and authority to enter into this Agreement and perform its obligations hereunder.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: B. The execution, delivery, and performance of this Agreement has been duly authorized and approved by the Board of Directors of LEADER, and this Agreement constitutes a valid and binding Agreement of LEADER in accordance with its terms.
texts.text: B. The execution, delivery, and performance of this Agreement has been duly authorized and approved by the Board of Directors of LEADER, and this Agreement constitutes a valid and binding Agreement of LEADER in accordance with its terms.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: C. LEADER has not employed any broker or finder in connection with the transaction contemplated by this Agreement and has taken no action that would give rise to a valid claim against any party for a brokerage commission, finder's fee, or other like payment.
texts.text: C. LEADER has not employed any broker or finder in connection with the transaction contemplated by this Agreement and has taken no action that would give rise to a valid claim against any party for a brokerage commission, finder's fee, or other like payment.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: D. LEADER has not employed any broker or finder in connection with the transactions contemplated by this Agreement, or taken action that would give rise to a valid claim against any party for a brokerage commission, finder's fee, or other like payment.
texts.text: D. LEADER has not employed any broker or finder in connection with the transactions contemplated by this Agreement, or taken action that would give rise to a valid claim against any party for a brokerage commission, finder's fee, or other like payment.

texts.label: page_footer
texts.orig: Source: HER IMPORTS, 8-K/A, 10/18/2016
texts.text: Source: HER IMPORTS, 8-K/A, 10/18/2016

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: F. The execution and delivery of this Agreement by LEADER and the consummation of the contemplated transactions, will not result in the creation or imposition of any valid lien, charge, or encumbrance on any of the Assets, and will not require the authorization, consent, or approval of any third party, including any governmental subdivision or regulatory agency.
texts.text: F. The execution and delivery of this Agreement by LEADER and the consummation of the contemplated transactions, will not result in the creation or imposition of any valid lien, charge, or encumbrance on any of the Assets, and will not require the authorization, consent, or approval of any third party, including any governmental subdivision or regulatory agency.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: G. LEADER has no knowledge of any claim, litigation, proceeding, or investigation pending or threatened against LEADER or its Assets that might result in any material adverse change in the business or condition of the Assets being conveyed under this Agreement.
texts.text: G. LEADER has no knowledge of any claim, litigation, proceeding, or investigation pending or threatened against LEADER or its Assets that might result in any material adverse change in the business or condition of the Assets being conveyed under this Agreement.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: H. None of the representations or warranties of LEADER contain or will contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit or will omit or misstate a material fact necessary in order to make statements in this Agreement not misleading. LEADER knows of no fact that has resulted, or will result in a material change in the business, operations, or assets of LEADER.
texts.text: H. None of the representations or warranties of LEADER contain or will contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit or will omit or misstate a material fact necessary in order to make statements in this Agreement not misleading. LEADER knows of no fact that has resulted, or will result in a material change in the business, operations, or assets of LEADER.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 4. REPRESENTATIONS OF EZJR. EZJR represents and warrants as follows:
texts.text: 4. REPRESENTATIONS OF EZJR. EZJR represents and warrants as follows:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: A. EZJR is a corporation duly organized, validly existing, and in good standing under the laws of the State of Nevada. EZJR has all requisite corporate power and authority to enter into this Agreement and perform its obligations hereunder.
texts.text: A. EZJR is a corporation duly organized, validly existing, and in good standing under the laws of the State of Nevada. EZJR has all requisite corporate power and authority to enter into this Agreement and perform its obligations hereunder.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: B. The execution, delivery, and performance of this Agreement has been duly authorized and approved by the Board of Directors of EZJR, and this Agreement constitutes a valid and binding Agreement of EZJR in accordance with its terms.
texts.text: B. The execution, delivery, and performance of this Agreement has been duly authorized and approved by the Board of Directors of EZJR, and this Agreement constitutes a valid and binding Agreement of EZJR in accordance with its terms.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: C. EZJR has not employed any broker or finder in connection with the transaction contemplated by this Agreement and has taken no action that would give rise to a valid claim against any party for a brokerage commission, finder's fee, or other like payment.
texts.text: C. EZJR has not employed any broker or finder in connection with the transaction contemplated by this Agreement and has taken no action that would give rise to a valid claim against any party for a brokerage commission, finder's fee, or other like payment.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: D. None of the representations or warranties of EZJR contain or will contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit or will omit or misstate a material fact necessary in order to make the statements contained herein not misleading.
texts.text: D. None of the representations or warranties of EZJR contain or will contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit or will omit or misstate a material fact necessary in order to make the statements contained herein not misleading.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. INDEMNIFICATION AND SURVIVAL. All representations and warranties made in this Agreement shall survive the Closing of this Agreement, except that any party to whom a representation or warranty has been made in this Agreement shall be deemed to have waived any misrepresentation or breach of representation or warranty of which such party had knowledge prior to Closing. Any party learning of a misrepresentation or breach of representation or warranty under this Agreement shall immediately give written notice thereof to all other parties to this Agreement. The representations and warranties in this Agreement shall terminate one year from the Closing Date, and such representations or warranties shall thereafter be without force or effect, except any claim with respect to which notice has been given to the party to be charged prior to such expiration date. LEADER hereby agrees to indemnify and hold EZJR, it successors, and assigns harmless from and against any and all damage or deficiency resulting from any material misrepresentation, breach of warranty or covenant, or nonfulfillment of any agreement on the part of LEADER under this Agreement.
texts.text: 3. INDEMNIFICATION AND SURVIVAL. All representations and warranties made in this Agreement shall survive the Closing of this Agreement, except that any party to whom a representation or warranty has been made in this Agreement shall be deemed to have waived any misrepresentation or breach of representation or warranty of which such party had knowledge prior to Closing. Any party learning of a misrepresentation or breach of representation or warranty under this Agreement shall immediately give written notice thereof to all other parties to this Agreement. The representations and warranties in this Agreement shall terminate one year from the Closing Date, and such representations or warranties shall thereafter be without force or effect, except any claim with respect to which notice has been given to the party to be charged prior to such expiration date. LEADER hereby agrees to indemnify and hold EZJR, it successors, and assigns harmless from and against any and all damage or deficiency resulting from any material misrepresentation, breach of warranty or covenant, or nonfulfillment of any agreement on the part of LEADER under this Agreement.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 4. GOVERNING LAW. This Agreement and any matters arising out of or related to this Agreement will be governed by the laws of the State of Nevada. If any action is brought among the parties with respect to this Agreement or otherwise, by way of a claim or counterclaim, the parties agree that in any such action, and on all issues, the parties irrevocably waive their right to a trial by jury. Exclusive jurisdiction and venue for any such action shall be the State Courts of Nevada.
texts.text: 4. GOVERNING LAW. This Agreement and any matters arising out of or related to this Agreement will be governed by the laws of the State of Nevada. If any action is brought among the parties with respect to this Agreement or otherwise, by way of a claim or counterclaim, the parties agree that in any such action, and on all issues, the parties irrevocably waive their right to a trial by jury. Exclusive jurisdiction and venue for any such action shall be the State Courts of Nevada.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 5. ENTIRE AGREEMENT. This Agreement contains the entire agreement among the parties, and supersedes all prior agreements, representations and understandings of the parties, relating to the subject matter of this Agreement.
texts.text: 5. ENTIRE AGREEMENT. This Agreement contains the entire agreement among the parties, and supersedes all prior agreements, representations and understandings of the parties, relating to the subject matter of this Agreement.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 6. FURTHER ACTIONS. Each party agrees that after the delivery of this Agreement it or he will execute and deliver such further documents and do such further acts and things as another party may reasonably request in order to carry out the terms of this Agreement.
texts.text: 6. FURTHER ACTIONS. Each party agrees that after the delivery of this Agreement it or he will execute and deliver such further documents and do such further acts and things as another party may reasonably request in order to carry out the terms of this Agreement.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 7. AMENDMENT. No supplement to or amendment of this Agreement will be binding unless executed in writing by LEADER and EZJR.
texts.text: 7. AMENDMENT. No supplement to or amendment of this Agreement will be binding unless executed in writing by LEADER and EZJR.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 8. SUCCESSORS AND ASSIGNS. This Agreement will be binding on, and will inure to the benefit of, the parties and their respective successors and assigns, and shall not confer any rights or remedies on any other Persons.
texts.text: 8. SUCCESSORS AND ASSIGNS. This Agreement will be binding on, and will inure to the benefit of, the parties and their respective successors and assigns, and shall not confer any rights or remedies on any other Persons.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 9. COUNTERPARTS. This Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, each of which will be deemed a valid, original agreement, but all of which together will constitute one and the same instrument.
texts.text: 9. COUNTERPARTS. This Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, each of which will be deemed a valid, original agreement, but all of which together will constitute one and the same instrument.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 10. SEVERABILITY. If any provision of this Agreement or its application to any Person or circumstances is held to be unenforceable or invalid by any court of competent jurisdiction, its other applications and the remaining provisions of this Agreement will be interpreted so as best reasonably to effect the intent of the parties.
texts.text: 10. SEVERABILITY. If any provision of this Agreement or its application to any Person or circumstances is held to be unenforceable or invalid by any court of competent jurisdiction, its other applications and the remaining provisions of this Agreement will be interpreted so as best reasonably to effect the intent of the parties.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 11. ATTORNEYS' FEES. Each party will pay its or his own legal fees and other expenses in connection with the preparation of this Agreement and the sale of Assets in accordance with this Agreement. However, if any legal action or other proceeding is brought for the enforcement of this Agreement, or because or arising out of an alleged dispute, breach, default or misrepresentation in connection with any of the provisions of this Agreement, the prevailing party will be entitled to recover reasonable attorney's fees and other costs incurred in that action or proceeding, in addition to any other relief to which it or he may be entitled.
texts.text: 11. ATTORNEYS' FEES. Each party will pay its or his own legal fees and other expenses in connection with the preparation of this Agreement and the sale of Assets in accordance with this Agreement. However, if any legal action or other proceeding is brought for the enforcement of this Agreement, or because or arising out of an alleged dispute, breach, default or misrepresentation in connection with any of the provisions of this Agreement, the prevailing party will be entitled to recover reasonable attorney's fees and other costs incurred in that action or proceeding, in addition to any other relief to which it or he may be entitled.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 12. NOTICES. All notices, requests, demands, and other communications required or permitted hereunder will be in writing and will be deemed to have been duly given when delivered by hand, by overnight courier, or fax, or two days after being mailed by certified or registered mail, return receipt requested, with postage prepaid.
texts.text: 12. NOTICES. All notices, requests, demands, and other communications required or permitted hereunder will be in writing and will be deemed to have been duly given when delivered by hand, by overnight courier, or fax, or two days after being mailed by certified or registered mail, return receipt requested, with postage prepaid.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 13. WAIVERS. Any provision of this Agreement may be waived at anytime by the party entitled to the benefit thereof by a written instrument executed by the party or by a duly authorized officer of the party. No waiver of any of the provisions of this Agreement will be deemed, or will constitute, a waiver of any other provision, whether or not similar, nor will any waiver constitute a continuing waiver.
texts.text: 13. WAIVERS. Any provision of this Agreement may be waived at anytime by the party entitled to the benefit thereof by a written instrument executed by the party or by a duly authorized officer of the party. No waiver of any of the provisions of this Agreement will be deemed, or will constitute, a waiver of any other provision, whether or not similar, nor will any waiver constitute a continuing waiver.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Exhibit A
texts.text: Exhibit A

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Customer Relationship Management System Description
texts.text: Customer Relationship Management System Description

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The Customer Relationship Management ("CRM") system entails all aspects of interaction that a company has with its customer, whether it is sales or service-related. It also provides a greater understanding of the customer and helps manage customer data and all interaction with the customer. Advantages and features of the CRM are as following:
texts.text: The Customer Relationship Management ("CRM") system entails all aspects of interaction that a company has with its customer, whether it is sales or service-related. It also provides a greater understanding of the customer and helps manage customer data and all interaction with the customer. Advantages and features of the CRM are as following:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: ● Enhanced customer relationship management including retention tools and fraud prevention.
texts.text: ● Enhanced customer relationship management including retention tools and fraud prevention.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: ● Recurring billing feature that allows for fully automated billing and tools to determine approval and decline rates and automated retries of declines.
texts.text: ● Recurring billing feature that allows for fully automated billing and tools to determine approval and decline rates and automated retries of declines.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: ● Profit management tools including affiliate commission tracking, price point testing and indemnification of revenue loss causes.
texts.text: ● Profit management tools including affiliate commission tracking, price point testing and indemnification of revenue loss causes.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: ● Gateway integration and merchant account load balancing.
texts.text: ● Gateway integration and merchant account load balancing.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: ● Improved affiliate management and affiliate fraud detection.
texts.text: ● Improved affiliate management and affiliate fraud detection.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: ● Better reporting and performance tracking.
texts.text: ● Better reporting and performance tracking.
